page.title: 03Life in Beckington.
page.content:
'I like living in Beckington because it is a small village and I have friends in walking distance. The houses do not have small gardens. It is a convenient place because it is not far from places like Longleat and Frome and Trowbridge.'
'Beckington is a quiet place round Sandy View. There are lots of children to play with. We play tracking all round the mound and round the block and round Rylands... There are lots of good places to hide on the mound. Sometimes we play hopscotch or hide and seek but mostly we play races.'
'I like living in Beckington because quite a lot of things go on. There are parties for the children - one after Christmas. We have all kinds of food.'
